profile:
Bros. Roofing has provided high-quality roofing services to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Bros. Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Bros. Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!
All our services are competitively priced and we provide educational information as well. 

You can count on us:
Most Affordable and Excellenct Roofing Service For You~~

profile:
Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.
 
We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Based in St. Catharines, Ontario, 

Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.

profile:
AM Group of Companies has been in operation since 1956 and is a 3rd generation family business.

We stand behind our work with one of the best warranties in the business, 10 years. This is only possible as a result of three things: the use of premium products, good workmanship and careful inspection of completed work.

AM Group of Companies hires only skilled workers who are regularly educated on installation methods and new materials. Our corporate education programs apply to all facets of the business.

Proudly situated in Guelph, London, Owen Sound, Gravenhurst and Collingwood, our size and office geography allow us to deliver corporate-grade professionalism while maintaining top rate local customer service.

AM Group of Companies Services:
Commercial Roofing
Residential Roofing
Fiberglass Shingles, Metal Roof, Flat Roof, Cedar Shakes & Shingles, Composite Roofing, Inspire, Owens Corning, Enviroshake.
Eavestrough, Soffit, Fascia and other Aluminum work
Attic Insulation, Blown In Insulation
Skylights, Velux
Ventilation
Roof repair & replacement
Siding
Windows & Doors
Vinyl Windows
Entry Doors
Patio Doors
 
Contact us today for a Free, no obligation estimate.
1-877-281-6900

profile:
Leafguard is available in Canada

Trades by Jack is proud to offer this fantastic product to help you. Avoid the messy work involved in dealing with your gutters and eavestroughs.

Say goodbye to the dangerous and unpleasant job of climbing up to your roof to clean out your gutters once and for all, without the expense of paying someone else to do it.

Gutters capture the rainwater from your roof and carry it safely to the ground, away from your foundation, where it can cause serious damage. Ordinary gutters capture leaves, twigs and other organic debris that causes them to clog and overflow during rainstorms.

 •LeafGuard’s patented design causes rainwater to flow around its curved hood and into the gutter, keeping leaves and debris out.
 •LeafGuard Brand Gutters are guaranteed not to clog for as long as you own your home, or Gutter Depot will clean your gutters for free.
 •LeafGuard Gutters are made to fit any home in a variety of colours. Best of all they are made out durable materials, designed to last as long as you have a roof.
 
 Call Us for Free Estimate!


Service Areas: Ajax, Aurora, Bolton, Brampton, Burlington, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Maple, Oakville, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Toronto, Vaughan, Whitby, Woodbridge & Beyond!


Contact Details

Address: 5132 Timberlea Blvd.
Mississauga, Ontario, L4W 2S5
Phone: (289) 271-0636
Email: info@tradesbyjack.ca


Why Trades by Jack?

Trades by Jack can help you say goodbye, permanently, to the dangerous and distressing job of clearing out your rain gutters –without having to pay someone else to do it.

profile:
Hello, 

My name is Tommy Hrstic and I am the owner of Sunrise Aluminum.  I have 20 years of hands on experience in the industry, and Sunrise Aluminum has been serving the greater Toronto area and beyond for more than 15 years and counting.  We specialize in seamless aluminum eaves trough installations, along with large square downspouts which has been the industry standard for the vast majority of residential homes and many commercial properties over the past decade.  We have remained a small company and all your interactions will be be with me directly and all our work is done or overseen by me personally to ensure the highest quality and customer satisfaction.  We use only the highest quality materials and aluminum purchased from reputable suppliers (Gentek and Kaycan) with many colours and materials to chose from.  

At Sunrise Aluminum we have always placed customer satisfaction as our number one priority, and have had continued success mostly thanks to their positive feedback and referrals.  With us you can always expect top quality product and workmanship for a fair price, and you can always count on us to complete your job in a timely manner as we pride ourselves in our commitment to punctuality, efficiency, and reliability.  

Contact us for a free estimate and consultation, we look forward to working with you.


Tommy Hrstic
Sunrise Aluminum
